ExtlRecShrFieldMap.name: ExtlRecShrFieldMap
ExtlRecShrFieldMap.description: Represents the external record share field mapping between the sender and receiver for Partner Connect.

ImportedFieldId.description: ID of the ExtlRecShrField record containing the field data sent from the external system.

InternalFieldId.description: ID of the ExtlRecShrField record containing the field data received on the internal system.
